dict.acceptation: 温度；体温；气温；<口>发烧，高烧；

sent.orig: High flexibility temperature feedback system can testing, rectifying and compensating temperature instantly, ensure temperature accuracy.
sent.trans: 高灵敏的温度回馈系统，能及时对温度检测、校正、补偿。有效的保证温度的精确度。

sent.orig: The infrared radiation temperature sensor gathering cloth body temperature is a advanced survey fabric temperature method.
sent.trans: 用红外辐射温度传感器直接采集运动布身温度，是一种先进的则量织物温度的方法。

sent.orig: Wider application of the temperature, low temperature and high temperature treatment can achieve good results.
sent.trans: 较宽的温度适用泛围，在低温下和较高的温度下都能达到良好的处理效果。

sent.orig: Its main products are mic-rocomputer temperature controller, temperature controller using in freezer and digital temperature display.
sent.trans: 主要产品有微电脑温度控制器、冷库电气控制箱、数字温度显示器等。

sent.orig: The friendly-machine interface is developed to calculate milling temperature, draw temperature-time curve and visualize temperature field.
sent.trans: 建立了友好的人机交互界面，用于计算铣削温度、绘制温度-时间曲线和可视化温度场。
